channel.title: Webclient coding help

item.title: Webclient coding help
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

Okay so im working on a webclient and i found a good site (webs.com)

Okay so this code:

[code]

Server name here!!!

 

document.write('id=game '); document.write('width="100%" '); document.write('height="100%" '); document.write('alt="Please visit http://yoursite.com/ifnotworking.html if it wont load" '); document.write('archive=your client.jar upload link here! '); document.write('code=RunClient.class '); document.write('mayscript>');
[/code]

(i changed the archive link to the right one) and this is what showed up:

document.write('id=game '); document.write('width="100%" '); document.write('height="100%" '); document.write('alt="Please visit http://yoursite.com/ifnotworking.html if it wont load" '); document.write('archive=your client.jar upload link here! '); document.write('code=RunClient.class '); document.write('mayscript>');

So that doesnt work… now i used this code:

[code]

Your Webclient [/code]

once again i changed the archive to the right one and now it shows the java logo loads up but than its all white with an error logo and when i click it it says: ClassNotFoundException: RunClient.class
any help?

EDIT: THIS IS A 639 SERVER!

Read full topic
